title: Comment update
author: VD
content_html:
CoComment’s Lec drops a line: “We just released fixes for the 0 comment issue and the truncated comment. Please tell me if you see any problem coming again on those issues. We are now developing the Preview and Citations. Both should be available next week.”

As you’ve probably noticed, I increased the size of the comment box, which appears to be sufficient for everyone but the would-be novelists. The comment frame option should also be coming soon, it’s already being tested and I’ve seen it in operation. But please be aware that we’ll probably go through an iterative process again on the precise form it takes.
